/*
 * ujjwalgarg
 */

#include <stdio.h>
#define gc getchar_unlocked

inline int input() {
    register int t=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>'9' || c<'0')
	c=getchar_unlocked();
	while(c<='9' && c>='0')	{
    	t=(t<<1)+(t<<3)+c-'0';
    	c=getchar_unlocked();
	}
	return t;
}


int main(void) {
    int a=input();
    int b=input();
    while(a!=0 && b!=0) {
        int carry=0,carry_count=0,ad,bd;
        while(a>0||b>0) {
            ad=a%10;
            bd=b%10;
            if((ad+bd+carry)<=9)
                carry=0;
            else {
                carry=1;
                carry_count++;
            }
            /*if(a/10==0&&b/10==0&&carry==1)
                carry_count--;*/
            a/=10;
            b/=10;
        }
        if(carry_count == 0)
            printf("No carry operation.\n");
        else if(carry_count == 1)
            printf("%d carry operation.\n",carry_count);
        else
            printf("%d carry operations.\n",carry_count);
        a=input();
        b=input();
    }
	return 0;
}
